=========================

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1724WL_00
From: Mariam Husain Ali Mandeel <mariam.mandeel@gig-gulf.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: DL_GIGMotorMarineTeam <GIGMotorMarine@gig-gulf.com>; DL_GIGNonMotorTeam <GIGNonMotor@gig-gulf.com>; Rajesh Srinivasan <Rajesh.Srinivasan@gig-gulf.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-16 17:36
Subject: CHALHOUB & BUHINDI CO. W.L.L  (ASHRAF BGDC CO) Renewal 2025 -2026
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


PUBLIC



Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing well and keeping safe.

 

We would like to bring to your kind attention that the below mentioned insurance policies are due for renewal on 24th September 2025,  detailed as below:

 

*	Marine Open Covers – policy nos. 61/MO/060242/00/00, 61/MO/000278/00/00 & 61/MO/000279/00/00

*	Commercial General Liability - policy no. 60/PC/30042/0/11
*	Property All Risks - policy no. 60/FA/70765/0/15

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

chunks.text:
*	Commercial General Liability - policy no. 60/PC/30042/0/11
*	Property All Risks - policy no. 60/FA/70765/0/15

 

We are pleased to invite renewal as attached, subject to no claims between now and the renewal date.

 

We would like to invite you for a renewal meeting discussion via teams. Please let us know your convenient time and date.

 

Please note that our renewal is subject to the following Important Notices. 

Important Notices:

It is important to review the value of Insured Property to ensure that the same is insured for current replacement value, so that you are adequately indemnified in the event of any claim payable under the Policy.  If the property is found to be insured for lower value, then the claim, if any, will be reduced proportionately as per Policy condition.  We therefore, urge you to review the values considering the inflation and it is necessary to revise the values of all Insured Items for this renewal.

The renewal terms are subject to no further deterioration of losses and Nil outstanding of premium under the policy as on the date of confirmation.  Further AXA reserves the right to deny and / or withhold the renewal of this insurance policy should premium(s) for the expiring period remain outstanding.

Kindly make a note of the above and you are requested to settle all outstanding amounts before confirmation of cover in order to avoid such complications.

 

Non-Disclosure:

chunks.text:
The renewal terms are subject to no further deterioration of losses and Nil outstanding of premium under the policy as on the date of confirmation.  Further AXA reserves the right to deny and / or withhold the renewal of this insurance policy should premium(s) for the expiring period remain outstanding.

Kindly make a note of the above and you are requested to settle all outstanding amounts before confirmation of cover in order to avoid such complications.

 

Non-Disclosure: 

All facts which are likely to influence our assessment acceptance and renewal of this insurance must be advised to us if you fail to notify us of all relevant facts you may find that your policy will not operate or operate fully.

 

Claims:

if an accident which may result in a claim occurs between preparation of this renewal notice and renewal date the renewal terms may alter

 

Applicable Tax(s)

You accept and agree to pay any taxes on this Policy, in compliance with the laws and regulations

applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

CORONAVIRUS EXCLUSION (LMA5391)

Your Insurance Policy does not / This Insurance does not cover any claim in any way caused by or resulting from: 

a) Coronavirus disease (COVID-19);

chunks.text:
applicable in the territory of sale, including but not limited to value added tax (“VAT”), which is due on Your Policy, within fifteen working days from the date of request to pay by AXA. AXA will contact you in the event that VAT is applicable to Your Policy. Failure by You to pay any applicable taxes may result in Your Policy being rendered null and void or cancelled at AXA's discretion.

  

CORONAVIRUS EXCLUSION (LMA5391)

Your Insurance Policy does not / This Insurance does not cover any claim in any way caused by or resulting from: 

a) Coronavirus disease (COVID-19); 

b) Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2); 

c) any mutation or variation of SARS-CoV-2; 

d) any fear or threat of a), b) or c) above. 

 LMA5391 

04 March 2020

 

As required by the Central Bank of Bahrain as part of the Know Your Client commitment, please submit a copy of your CR along with the renewal instructions.

 

Looking forward for your renewal instructions together with any update in the limits/ sum insured to proceed further. Should you require any more clarifications please feel free to contact us, contact details as below.

 

Kind Regards,

 

Mariam Mandeel, BS – MBA – CERT CII - ALMI

Business Development & Underwriting Manager – P&C Commercial Lines



Headquarters, Bahrain Bay

Unit 51, Bldg. 298, Road 4609, Block 346

P.O. Box 11442, Manama / Sea Front, Kingdom of Bahrain

Tel +973 66328230 |Mobile +973 39749810| Email: mariam.mandeel@gig-gulf.com <mailto:mariam.mandeel@gig-gulf.com>

Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ إشعار بالسرية: يعتبر هذا البريد الإلكتروني (وبالإضافة لأي مرفقات) سرّي ومخصّص فقط لاستخدام المُرسَل إليه (المُرسَل إليهم). قد يحتوي على معلومات لحقوق أو امتيازات قانونية أو مهنية أو أخرى. إذا لم تكن المُرسَل إليه المقصود، يرجى إبلاغ المُرسِل على الفور وإتلاف هذا البريد الإلكتروني. أي وجهات نظر أو آراء يتم التعبير عنها أو ذكرها في هذه الرسالة هي آراء المرسل الشخصيّة، باستثناء الحالات التي يوضّحها المرسل بشكل صريح وبالسُلطة المخوّلة إليه بأنها وجهات نظر مجموعة الخليج للتأمين (الخليج) ش.م.ب. (م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب.
